meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tracy Bacon Mike Ponterotto Chantelle Schofield Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7547.

td.p: Tracy Bacon, a community college professor from Arvada, Colorado
Mike Ponterotto, a film & television producer from North Hollywood, California
Chantelle Schofield, an E.R. social worker from Fort Myers, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,402)

tr.td: MAJOR LEAGUE BASEBALL TEAM NICKNAMES
TALK OF THE TOWN
AWARDS & HONORS
NOTABLE WOMEN
BREAK FA*ST
(Alex: Each response will begin with "F-A" and end with "S-T".)
CEREALS

the Yankees

Mike
')
